special_text:
[i]“This world sings a rapturous melody, if you’d only spend the time to listen.”[/i]
Return all nonland permanents with mana value 2 or less to their owner’s hands.
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Exile this enchantment, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
rules_text2:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, you may exile a card from your graveyard with the same mana value and a different card type. If you do, cast a copy of the exiled card without paying its mana cost.
When Fakadeh dies, return this card to its owner’s hand.
